#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int cmpfunc (const void * a, const void * b)
{
   return ( *(int*)a - *(int*)b );
}
int main(){
	int n,a[1001][1001]={0},b[1000]={0},c[1000]={0},t=0,x,y;
	cin>>n;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
	{
		cin>>x>>y;
		a[x-1][y-1]=1;
		a[y-1][x-1]=1;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
	{
		a[i][i]=1;
	}
	for (int i = 0 ; i < n; i++){

		for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j){
		
			for (int k = 0; k < n; ++k){
		
				if(a[j][k]==0)
				{
					a[j][k]=a[j][i]*a[i][k];
				}
			}
		}
	}
	b[0]=0;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
	{
		if(a[0][i]==1)
			c[0]++;
	}
	for(int i = 1;i < n; i++ ){
		int l=1;
		for(int k = 0;k<=t;k++){
			if(a[b[k]][i]==1){
				l=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(l==1){
			b[++t]=i;
			for(int j = 0;j < n; j++ ){
				if(a[i][j]==1)
					c[t]++;
			}
		}
		
	}
	cout<<t+1<<endl;
	qsort(c,t+1,sizeof(int),cmpfunc);
	for (int i = 0; i < t+1; ++i)
	{
		cout<<c[i]<<" ";
	}
}
